How to install:

#################################################

About the game:

Bedtime Stories: The Lost Dreams is a fun hidden object adventure with four different chapters. Explore wonderful dream locations, solve tricky puzzles, and meet charming characters. Take on the role of a little boy who is determined to make others happy. Change the unhappy pasts of an unaccomplished ballerina, a genius detective, an acclaimed chocolatier, and a famous adventurer. This family-friendly game features a sweet storyline and amusing characters. Remember: All cherished dreams can come true!
